abstract: Kenneth R. Feinberg, the Treasury Department’s special master on executive compensation, said Monday that Lloyd C. Blankfein, chief executive of Goldman Sachs, consulted with him on the firm’s pay plans and adopted his “prescriptions.”
snippet: Kenneth R. Feinberg, the Treasury Department’s special master on executive compensation, said Monday that Lloyd C. Blankfein, chief executive of Goldman Sachs, consulted with him on the firm’s pay plans and adopted his “prescriptions.”
lead_paragraph: Update | 12:24 p.m. Kenneth R. Feinberg, the Treasury Department‘s special master on executive compensation, said Monday that Lloyd C. Blankfein, chief executive of Goldman Sachs, consulted with him on the firm’s pay plans and adopted his “prescriptions.”

headline.main: Feinberg Says He Talked With Blankfein on Pay
